short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The web extension to give you confidence in your transactions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DeFi-Able's Transaction Simulator turns your browser into an extension of the EVM. 

With DeFi-Able, users have the power to simulate any Ethereum transaction before signing, to verify that the transaction will have the desired outcome. It works hand in hand with your favorite wallet provider. Simply use your wallet provider to send a transaction, and DeFi-Able will provide you with the simulated result of the transaction before you sign.
